questions.question_text: Which of the following is a risk to computer equipment when the humidity is low?

discussion.content: Static electricity, and therefore the risk of ESD, is much more prevalent in dry, cool environments.

questions.question_text:
A technician is looking for guidance on securing access to the administrator account.
Which of the following policies should the technician reference?

comments.content:
I think C is correct actually. Compliance from what I see from Messer/Prowse/Schmidt etc seems to be more about compliance with laws and regulations. Messer has Compliance down as "Meeting the standards of laws, policies, and regulations. Scope- Domestic and international requirements"
AUP on the other hand, succinctly put by Schmidt says
"Acceptable use policy (AUP)â€”Any service or app used today will have an AUP, but businesses also have their own AUPs that define what is allowed to be used or done when connected to the corporate network or using company-owned hardware/software. Technicians need to be familiar with the AUP and should refer users to it when necessary."

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
I'm pretty sure this falls under Compliance, so I'm thinking answer is D.

questions.question_text:
A systems administrator is configuring a new workstation.
Which of the following will MOST likely be the administrator's FIRST step?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
If the technician is setting up the workstation out of the box before even installing the OS, setting the BIOS/UEFI password should be the first step, so answer C. seems more appropriate.

Selected Answer: B
Open the Administration Utility.
On Windows operating system, click Start > Programs > IBM Host On-Demand > Administration > Administration Utility. On other platforms, open HODAdmin.html in the HOD directory. You can open the Administrator window from any computer that has access to the Host On-Demand server.
Logon.
The default user ID is admin and the password is password.
Change your administrator password.
For security reasons, you should change the default administrator password.

Click Users/Groups.
Right-click admin from the User List, and click Properties.
Type the new password in the New Password box and the Confirm Password fields.
Click OK.

questions.question_text:
A Chief Financial Officer (CFO) who is returning from vacation notices several emails from the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) requesting funds be transferred immediately. The CFO replies that the funds will be transferred, but the CEO responds that there was never a request for funds to be transferred.
Which of the following MOST likely happened?

comments.content: nvm hijacking is correct because the CEO's email has been compromised

questions.question_text:
A technician found that an employee is mining cryptocurrency on a work desktop. The company has decided that this action violates its guidelines.
Which of the following should be updated to reflect this new requirement?
